full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

| Description | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Title | EH990-231455 - Office Seating Request for Bid (RFB) |
| Reference Number | WS3824772797-Doc3849408567 |
| Amendment Number | 6 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3824772797 |
| Publication Date | January 30, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | March 1, 2023, at 14:00 EST |
| Amendment Date | February 22, 2023 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | March 31, 2023 |
| Expected Contract End Date | September 30, 2023 |

## Tender Specifications

* UNSPSC Code: 56112102, 56112103, 56112106
	+ Task seating
	+ Guest seating
	+ Stool seating
* Region of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Tender Status

* Tender Status: Expired
* Current Status: Bid Closing Date has Expired
* Reason for Expiration: Bid Closing Date has passed

## Government Agreement

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) Against Supply Arrangement
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Technical Specifications

* Office seating is required for purchase, delivery, and installation to Ottawa, Ontario between June 2023 and January 2024.
* Bid submission deadline: March 1, 2023, by 14:00 EST.
* Full Request for Bid (RFB) and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into a SAP Ariba account.

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Michelle Wong, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Email: [michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Trade Agreements

The tender adheres to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
